unittitle_ssm: Tom Prendergast photographs of Revolutionary Cemetery
abstract_ssm: Three photos by Tom Prendergast, dated 1983, of the Revolutionary Cemetery in the Bay Ridge neighborhood of Brooklyn. Photographs show tombstones and memorials for members of prominent Brooklyn families, including the Barkaloo, Suydam, and Cortelyou families.
collection_ssm: Tom Prendergast photographs of Revolutionary Cemetery
heading_ssm: Tom Prendergast photographs of Revolutionary Cemetery

collection_sim: Tom Prendergast photographs of Revolutionary Cemetery
